text: Chaudefontaine is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2018, it was merged into the new commune of Marchaux-Chaudefontaine.Arrêté préfectoral 4 December 2017 == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Chaudefontaine, Doubs
